# MarketplaceAuction.buyoutListing property

Buyout Auction

## Example

```javascript
// The listing ID of the asset you want to buy
const listingId = 0;

await contract.auction.buyoutListing(listingId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
buyoutListing: {
        (listingId: BigNumberish): Promise<Omit<{
            receipt: ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt;
            data: () => Promise<unknown>;
        }, "data">>;
        prepare: (listingId: BigNumberish) => Promise<Transaction<Omit<{
            receipt: ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt;
            data: () => Promise<unknown>;
        }, "data">>>;
    };
```

## Remarks

Buy a specific direct listing from the marketplace.
